comprehensive_overview: Trim Galore is a tool for quality and adapter trimming of Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data. It automates the processes of removing adapters and low-quality bases from high-throughput sequencing data generated by platforms such as Illumina.
core_features: Automated quality and adapter trimming of NGS data
Removal of sequencing adapters and low-quality bases
Compatibility with various types of sequencing data
Support for paired-end and single-end reads
Quality control reports and statistics generation
